page.title: 01 GENERAL VIEW
page.content: The area covered by our survey is mostly agricultural and green belt land The area is a commuter area for those working in London.The town of Amersham is split into two with the older part being down the hill from the study area.The houses are modern and generally privately owned.The town has a small shopping area and a sporting complex.Around the town there is plenty of countryside which the residents have easy access too.The businessmen find the area useful as the old Metropolitan Railway runs straight into the heart of London.There are a number of places around the area thaT have historical merit.i.e,Latimer Roman villa and the Old Town.
